what: Flexible & Tidy Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
title: Flexible & Tidy Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: flexible user-friendly interface Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API. package supports available endpoints, making easy access financial data stock prices, company metrics, economic indicators. Returned data formatted tidy structure snake_case column names.

title: Flexible & Tidy Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: Currently, fmpapi CRAN. can install development version GitHub:

title: Flexible & Tidy Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: using package, need set Financial Modeling Prep API key. can set using fmp_set_api_key() function, saves key .Renviron file future use (either project home folder).

title: Flexible & Tidy Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: Since FMP API myriad enpoints parameters, package provides single function handle requests: fmp_get(). can retrieve company’s profile providing stock symbol profile endpoint: retrieve balance sheet statements company, use balance-sheet-statement endpoint can specify whether retrieve annual quarterly data using period parameter number records via limit. Note need paid account quarterly data. income-statement endpoint allows retrieve income statements specific stock symbol. can fetch cash flow statements using cash-flow-statement endpoint. free endpoints live API version 3, can also control api version fmp_get(), need paid endpoints. instance, symbol_change endpoint:
code: fmp_get(resource = "profile", symbol = "AAPL") fmp_get(resource = "balance-sheet-statement", symbol = "AAPL", period = "annual", limit = 5) fmp_get(resource = "income-statement", symbol = "AAPL") fmp_get(resource = "cash-flow-statement", symbol = "AAPL") fmp_get(resource = "symbol_change", api_version = "v4")

title: Flexible & Tidy Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: two existing R packages also provide interface FMP API. packages lack flexibility provide dedicated functions endpoint, means users need study FMP API docs package documentation developers create new functions new endpoint. fmpapi: released CRAN last commit 3 years ago. fmpcloudr: last updated CRAN 3 years ago.

title: Flexible & Tidy Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API
text: Feel free open issues submit pull requests improve package. Contributions welcome!

title: Flexible & Tidy Client for the Financial Modeling Prep API

what: Retrieve Financial Data from the FMP API — fmp_get
title: Retrieve Financial Data from the FMP API — fmp_get
text: function fetches financial data Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API, including balance sheet statements, income statements, cash flow statements, historical market data, stock lists, company profiles.

title: Retrieve Financial Data from the FMP API — fmp_get
Retrieve Financial Data from the FMP API — fmp_get
text: resource string indicating API resource query. Examples include "balance-sheet-statement", "income-statement", "cash-flow-statement", "historical-market-capitalization", "profile", "stock/list". symbol string specifying stock ticker symbol (optional). ... Additional arguments customize query. Examples include: limit: integer indicating number results return. period: string specifying reporting period, "annual" "quarterly". : string YYYY-MM-DD format indicating start date historical queries. : string YYYY-MM-DD format indicating end date historical queries. query: search string querying stock information. api_version string specifying version FMP API use. Defaults "v3".

title: Retrieve Financial Data from the FMP API — fmp_get
text: data frame containing balance sheet statements.

title: Retrieve Financial Data from the FMP API — fmp_get
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Get available balance sheet statements fmp_get(   resource = "balance-sheet-statement",   symbol = "AAPL" )  # Get last income statements fmp_get(   resource = "income-statement",   symbol = "AAPL",   limit = 1 )  # Get annual cash flow statements fmp_get(   resource = "cash-flow-statement",   symbol = "AAPL",   period = "annual" )  # Get historical market capitalization fmp_get(   resource = "historical-market-capitalization",   symbol = "UNH",   from = "2023-12-01",   to = "2023-12-31"  )  # Get stock list fmp_get(   resource = "stock/list" )  # Get company profile fmp_get(   resource = "profile", symbol = "AAPL" )  # Search for stock information fmp_get(   resource = "search", query = "AA" ) } # }

what: Set the Financial Modeling Prep API key — fmp_set_api_key
title: Set the Financial Modeling Prep API key — fmp_set_api_key
text: function prompts user input Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API key saves .Renviron file, either project directory home directory. also gives user option add .Renviron .gitignore security purposes.

title: Set the Financial Modeling Prep API key — fmp_set_api_key
Set the Financial Modeling Prep API key — fmp_set_api_key
text: Invisibly returns TRUE saving key aborting operation. function read .Renviron file saving, allowing environment variables immediately available. restart R session recommended.

what: Perform a request to the Financial Modeling Prep API — perform_request
title: Perform a request to the Financial Modeling Prep API — perform_request
text: function sends request Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API based specified resource additional query parameters. constructs request URL using base API URL specified version, automatically includes API key environment.

title: Perform a request to the Financial Modeling Prep API — perform_request
Perform a request to the Financial Modeling Prep API — perform_request
text: resource specific API resource accessed, stock symbol financial endpoint. base_url base URL FMP API. Defaults "https://financialmodelingprep.com/api/". api_version version FMP API use. Defaults "v3". ... Additional query parameters included API request.

title: Perform a request to the Financial Modeling Prep API — perform_request
text: parsed JSON response FMP API.

title: fmpapi (development version)
text: Refactored core data retrieval functions single flexible interface: fmp_get()

title: fmpapi 0.1.0
text: Added function set_fmp_api_key() store manage Financial Modeling Prep (FMP) API keys securely .Renviron file. get_company_profile() retrieve company’s profile based stock symbol. get_balance_sheet_statements() fetch balance sheet statements (annual quarterly) specific stock symbol. get_income_statements() retrieve income statements (annual quarterly) company. get_cash_flow_statements() retrieve cash flow statements (annual quarterly) company. API responses returned tidy data frames snake_case column names easy integration common R workflows.
